sentence.value: He was the pilot on STS-6 (April 4–9, 1983); and was the mission commander on STS-51-D (April 12–19, 1985) and STS-51-J (October 3–7, 1985).

sentence.value: SAIC staff are also responsible for operational support of simulations, including the large amplitude Vertical Motion Simulator and several high fidelity flight simulators.
sentence.annotated-sentence: SAIC staff are also responsible for operational support of [[simulations|Flight_simulator]], including the large [[amplitude|Amplitude_(video_game)]] Vertical [[Motion Simulator|Motion_simulator]] and several [[high fidelity|High_fidelity]] [[flight simulators|Flight_simulator]].
